phrases: Well, you might think number three's the weirdest one.
It is weird, is not it?
I am surprised you could think up something that weird...
Even if you were just joking, that is just sick.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
It is already been three days since I last spoke to Yano.
I know Yano was hiding it because he was being kind, not because he was being fair.
But... she is Nana-san's little sister.
Or did you just see Nana-san in her?
Whoa, Yano could not make a single basket.
No way, that is so unusual.
Oh, the boys are being tested right now.
My record of making all five shots since I was in 4th grade...
It is easy to tell when you have got something on your mind.
It is a good thing you are not going to be a pro athlete.
That is fine, since I am going to become a romance novelist.
That is out of the question.
I will use my own story as the plot.
I will have a ton of material.
You can be unexpectedly clumsy sometimes.
But I guess that would be a compliment for a guy, huh?
It sounds a hundred times better than saying you are graceful.
But I cannot really approve of that.
No matter how much I call her cellphone, she will not pick up.
She will not even look at me.
I have already called her fifty times.
Then call her a hundred times.
Even after he is come all the way out here?
I do not want to see him right now!
Nanami's in the bath right now...
Do not tell him I am in the bath!
If I spoke with him now, I would only be able to say cruel things.
Umm... I understand how you feel, but...
I think it might be best to leave her alone right now.
Sometimes it is easier to talk about things after everyone is calmed down a little.
By tomorrow, I am sure Nanami will-
Can you really guarantee that things will be better by tomorrow?
Please tell her I will see you tomorrow at school for me.
Be careful on your way home!
Even after he came all this way to give you these...
I have raised an ogre as a daughter.
D-Does he really think flowers will make everything better?
Who would fall for something like that?
Do not mess with me, you jerk!
Sometimes you really do not deserve him.
That man I do not deserve had sex with his ex-girlfriend's little sister.
But are not the flowers splendid?
I wonder if his mother went through a lot of effort getting them to grow this beautifully?
Look at all of these roses.
I am sure he picked them all from his garden in a rush and wrapped them in a newspaper without thinking...
I wonder if he really rode a bus carrying this huge bouquet with him...
I wish I could rewrite my past.
If I could, I would do all I could...
I am going out for a bit!
Where are you going at this time of night?
You are really not fair at all!
I really wanted to tell him off, but...
I love you, you big moron!
I might not've been able to forgive him.
But when I see his face, I feel like I do not have any choice.
It is frustrating, but I still want to be beside him.
Like they say, you will always give in to the other when you are in love...
Mizu-chin once told me I would not be able to beat someone who is dead.
But I cannot change his past.
So should not I try to make the present as happy as possible?
I do not want to speak badly of the dead...
That is why I am going to make Yano happy.
I must sound pretty dumb, huh?
Could I warn you of something, though?
If it is just going to be a relationship of hardship and mental agony, you should put an end to it.
We are going to be happy...
Where should we go on Sunday?
When I suggested the zoo before, you made fun of me!
Let us go see the monkeys!
I am not in the mood for monkeys.
Then what are you in the mood for?
Girls really love the beach, huh?
I know of a beach near here that is not like the ones you see in pictures.
Then let us go to the beach.
If people could do things over, I wonder if they...
Would they choose the people they encounter...
The sea's shining... it is so pretty.
Are not you glad we came?
We could probably do it over there if we used that as a bed.
If they only picked the things that made them happy...
I brought a jar with me.
What are you going to do after collecting these?
There are not any cherry petal shells, huh?
Do not you think we would have to go a little further south to find nice ones like that?
Takahashi, it is just a sea slater!
I made too much of a fuss.
You hate bugs, do not you?
It just surprised me a little...
Who are you... confusing me with?
She lied to you, betrayed you, and left you all alone.
It makes sense for you to get angry.
You are right to hold a grudge.
You must want to complain to her, but you cannot.
Everything you have wanted to say.
All about your grudge, or whatever.
There is nothing like that left.
There has to be something you have wanted to say to her.
I will listen to everything you have to say.
If Nana-san were here, what would you say?
Hey, you guys are in the same class as Yuri, right?
I am sorry, but could you lend me some cash?
They call that sort of thing being blind.
You have not really fallen in love with anyone before.
They call people like you immature know-it-alls.
Hurry and really fall in love.
Do you still think he is going to come?
Then why are you waiting around?
That is not a hand warmer.
Hey... what do you think I should do?
Figure out your own problems yourself.
Because I am a moron, I do not know!
I could tell you, but in exchange, you better do as I say.
Probably something where no one cries or gets yelled at.
Where no one gets hit or has stuff thrown at them.
Then... why do not we both go searching for our own happiness?
If you saw her now, what would you tell her?
Tell me what you are feeling.
What you are saying and what you are doing are contradictory.
I promise I will not betray you.
That you absolutely will not betray me.
I will forgive you for everything.
I want you to come back to me alive.
That is why I am going to make Yano happy.
That is why... we need to make my past pale in comparison to our present.
I swear it on the stars.
If there is a shooting star, I wish to be with Nana-chan forever.
I am sorry for not being able to keep our promise...
Yano made his wish long ago...
Yano seems like he would be crushed by all of the sadness...
That was his way to protect himself...
Promise me that you will never leave my side.
I wonder why people... make promises they will not be able to keep...
You said serves you right before as well, did not you?
Do you want me to comfort you again?
As if I will ever fall for that again.
Kisetsu ga sukoshi ugoita ki ga suru
Futari no basu ha kawaranai machi
Yuuhi ga kage wo hosoku nobashita
Kitto saigo no jikan da to
Nido to aenai kimi senaka to
I Am About To wa ososugiru keredo
Stop the sunset kimi wo ushinaitakunai
Sora wo dakishimete tsutsumikomu you ni
Itsumo sugoshita futari no heya to umi wo aruita photograph
Hitotsu kawashita yakusoku ga hatasezu sugite yuku
Kokorobosoku natteta hitori no heya ni suwatte tooku ni kikoeru amaoto
Anata no yobugoe kikoeta ki ga shite
Omowazu atari wo boku ha miwatashita
Oka no ue dare mo inai
Subete ha yume no naka sa
Tooku no machinami akaruku hi ga sasu
Keredo mou i am about to ha tsurai
Boku no kokoro ni ikiteiru kara
Hitori kore kara boku ha doushiyou
Subete ha yume no naka sa
Subete ha yume no naka sa
I feel like the seasons have changed slightly
and the sunbeams have thinned and will one day shift.
But I was relieved, knowing our bus
The sunset stretches my shadow long and thin.
Its colors deeply dye my heart.
When you said this was probably the last time,
I just want to forget them all.
I continued to watch the last sunset
and your back that I would never see again.
And even though it is too late now...
I do not want to lose you.
your face would always look down at me.
Make it so the sun never sets...
The room we always lived in, that photograph when we walked on the beach...
The promise we made will go unkept.
I became so lonely alone in my room, listening to the distant rain.
I felt as if I heard you calling out for me.
It was just the wind pulling a prank on me.
There is no one on the hill.
as on the day when we broke up.
One day, the seasons will change again,
Even though flowers are blooming on the hill.
It is all a dream now.
The bright sunbeams glint off the distant houses and stores.
It is such a gentle city,
But right now, it is painful to me.
When we were both in love with each other,
Those days still live on in my heart,
but I do not know what to do from now on.
It is all a dream now.
It is all a dream now.
I regret what I did so much that I want to die.
Back then... back at that place... those actions I took...
Everything I choose is always wrong.
But I want you to listen to me...
What I told you this morning was my final notice.
Did not I tell you that you would regret it?
